meanings.definition: A person or thing that continues.
meanings.sent1: The continuers of the story were eager to know what happened next.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the continuers of the project for their dedication.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel was the continuer of the acorn-gathering tradition in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The river, a continuer of the rain's journey, flowed steadily towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The flame, a continuer of the match's spark, danced in the darkness.

meanings.definition: A student who continues their education after completing a course.
meanings.sent1: The continuer in the class always asked insightful questions.
meanings.sent2: Many continuers pursue higher degrees to expand their knowledge.
meanings.sent3: The continuer in the school play forgot their lines but improvised brilliantly.
meanings.sent4: The continuer of learning, like a seed growing into a tree, thrives on new information.
meanings.sent5: The continuer of knowledge, a torch in the dark, illuminates the path to success.
